events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30. They provided initial details about the collision with another vehicle at a traffic light intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident after confirming the keywords related to vehicle collision in the initial report.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant for further information.
The claimant was contacted and officially informed that their claim has been received and is under process with dedicated attention.
Request was sent to the customer asking for a police report, photos of the damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report, photos of both vehicles, and a detailed estimate from the repair shop.
The investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence and contacted witnesses to verify the details of the accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault and the extent of damage was validated as per the submitted reports.
A settlement offer was formulated based on the repair estimates and issued to the customer for review and acceptance.
The customer responded with appreciation for the prompt handling and agreed to the proposed settlement offer without objection.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager after validation of all documents and customer consent on the settlement.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customer's designated bank account to cover the vehicle repairs.
After confirming receipt of payment and repair completion, the claim was officially closed in the system with customer satisfaction noted.
The entire case file was archived to comply with internal policies for record keeping and future reference if necessary.
